alert.note: Alert for Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 6:44AM EST until January 15 at 8:23AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following river in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise affecting Muhlenberg County. .Recent heavy rainfall and snow melt, combined with elevated water levels upstream of Paradise, will keep the Green River in moderate flood stage this week, with a crest expected on Wednesday. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Paradise. * WHEN...Until Saturday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 386.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 386.5 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 380.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
